projects.name: FOAM PATROL
projects.description: App that displays creative design and Bay Area surf data
projects.longDes: Foam Patrol is a site I created to connect people who enjoy the sport of surfing or want to get into it. It hosts surf forecasts, surf trips, and paths to surf tutorials. ðŸ¤™

projects.name: GOPUP
projects.description: App that connects pet owners to pet-friendly business
projects.longDes: This app allows users to find dog-friendly businesses and activities. It makes use of Yelp's Fusion API and Mapbox to gather information on such businesses and activities.

projects.name: TENZIES
projects.description: Game where player collects all same-sided dice
projects.longDes: A game won by picking up all dice with the same face.
